message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a novel variant of the semi-bandits problem, which involves resource allocation with censored feedback. This problem is related to multiple-play multi-armed bandits and combinatorial semi-bandits, which are sub-fields of machine learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory), and cs.IT (Information Theory).
